location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from William Newnham, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting a letter written on 17 October from the Accountant General, John Kaye, to inform Newnham that the sum of 10,000 rupees was paid for the accounts of the Residency at Bushire, and requesting Bruce in the future to send large bills directly to the Governor.
